name: Debugger
author: Vector35
longdescription:
Debug Windows, Linux, and MacOS targets from within Binary Ninja.

### Screenshots

![](https://github.com/Vector35/debugger/blob/master/media/gui.png?raw=true)
![](https://github.com/Vector35/debugger/blob/master/media/cli.png?raw=true)

installinstructions.Darwin: To install this manually, please see the "Using Plugins" section of the [Getting Started Guide](https://docs.binary.ninja/getting-started.html#using-plugins). Or use Binary Ninja's built in plugin manager.
installinstructions.Windows: To install this manually, please see the "Using Plugins" section of the [Getting Started Guide](https://docs.binary.ninja/getting-started.html#using-plugins). Or use Binary Ninja's built in plugin manager.
installinstructions.Linux: To install this manually, please see the "Using Plugins" section of the [Getting Started Guide](https://docs.binary.ninja/getting-started.html#using-plugins). Or use Binary Ninja's built in plugin manager.
